#summary Release history of svg-edit

= Introduction =

This page describes past versions of svg-edit.  For the future, see the [Roadmap].

= Version 2.3 =
== New Features Added ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=52 Align Objects]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=42 Rotate Objects]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=51 Clone Objects]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=102 Select Next/Prev Object]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=59 Edit SVG Source]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=33 Gradient picking]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=34 Polygon Mode] (Path Editing, Phase 1)
 * ([http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ANeededFor-2.3 full list])
== Release Date ==
 * Sep 8th, 2009
== Demo ==
 * http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.3/editor/svg-editor.html

= Version 2.2 ==
== New Features Added ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=31 Multiselect Mode]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=19 Undo/Redo Actions]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=27 Resize Elements]
 * Contextual tools for rect, circle, ellipse, line, text elements
 * Some updated button images
 * Stretched the UI to fit the browser window
 * Resizing of the SVG canvas
 * Upgraded to [http://www.digitalmagicpro.com/jPicker/ jPicker] 1.0.8
 * ([http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ANeededFor-2.2 full list])
== Release Date ==
 * July 8th, 2009
== Demo ==
 * http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.2/editor/svg-editor.html

= Version 2.1 ==
== New Features Added ==
 * tooltips added to all UI elements
 * edit of fill opacity, stroke opacity, group opacity
 * selection of elements
 * move/drag of elements
 * save SVG file to separate tab
 * create and edit text elements
 * contextual panel of tools
 * change rect radius, font-family, font-size
 * keystroke handling
 * ([http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ANeededFor-2.1 full list])
== Release Date ==
 * Jun 17th, 2009
== Demo ==
 * http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.1/editor/svg-editor.html

= Version 2.0 ==
== New Features Added ==
 * draw ellipse, square
 * change stroke-dasharray (line style)
 * rearranged whole code to OOP
 * GUI enhancement
== Dates ==
 * Released - Jun 03, 2009
 * Demo URL - http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.0/svg-editor.html
 * Related Revision - http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/source/detail?r=24

= Version 1.0 ==
== New Features ==
 * draw path, line, freehand-circle, rect
 * clear drawn image
 * delete element
 * save image
== Dates ==
 * Released - Feb 13, 2009
 * Demo URL - http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/1.0/svg-editor.html
 * Related Revision - http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/source/detail?r=9
